header.notice: This version of ONE Launcher is a beta build which is not complete and may contain bugs. More information soon.

activate-content.title: Activate Content
activate-content.text: Activate your content (instances) with just one click, using an url or npoint key. There is no need to install mods or loaders or JDK runtimes by hand.

updates.title: Automatic updates
updates.text: Always have the necessary mods and files updated to play your favorite servers with mods.

all-in-one.title: All your servers in ONE Launcher
all-in-one.text: Play and manage all your servers from ONE Launcher, with a very easy to use interface.
